fields.request: Manual QA: Verify control/satellite network playbooks
fields.request_details: Use a staging environment with both control and satellite nodes assigned configuration profiles that reference the new ansible playbooks. Run `ansible-playbook ansible/playbooks/control.yml --limit <control-host>` and `ansible-playbook ansible/playbooks/satellite.yml --limit <satellite-host>` from the repo root. Confirm that NetworkManager now contains refreshed eth0-shared and gelectriic-ap profiles, the Wi-Fi radio is enabled, and the WireGuard constellation interface is provisioned with the expected peers. Capture before/after `nmcli connection show` output if differences appear.
